marklogic.body: Audrey, I have been a member for 7 weeks now. I have a dead thyroid so can sympathize. I have lost 10 lb so far which is a bit slow compared to many others but considering that nothing else has worked I am pleased. Even more than the weight Gain, I feel much better. I changed my Doctor two weeks ago. One who is open and encouraging towards healthful living. She changed my synthroid to armour thyroid which is natural and has encouraged me to take an iodine supplement. I am very encouraged by the results. She also noticed low iron. Things the other doctor has not mentioned in the 10 yrs I have gone there. Hang in there.
